about_the_game:
This DLC pack includes the following items:
・Playable Character
Yumi

・Mission Pack
Exclusive “Ice Queen” Prequel Campaign (10 Missions)

・Costumes
Gessen Uniform
Yumi’s Outfit

・Accessories
Yumi’s Ribbon
Yumiverine X
Yumi Badge

・Lingerie
Snow checkers
High Leg Snow Checkers
Snow Checkers Thong
High-leg Thong (Snow Checkers)
Low Rise Snow Checkers
Small High-Leg Snow Checkers

・Diorama Backgrounds
Gessen - Intérieur
Gessen - Toit

・Pics
Yumi Character Illustration (Burst Re:Newal)

・BGM
At Gessen Girls Academy
For Master Kurokage
Gessen Ninja Room

・Visuals
Yumi Visual Compilation

・Voices
Yumi Action Voice Compilation
Yumi System Voice Compilation

Unlock 2 Top Secret Files
